item.title: How to i make shop spend pest control points REP++
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

just an example may need conversion

[code]if (c.myShopId == 48) {
if (c.SPoints >= TotPrice2) {
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
c.SPoints -= TotPrice2;
c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have enough SlayerPoints to buy this item.”);
}

		}[/code]

also you need other things like when you dont have enough points to send a message and not give the item and when you have close to max points it wont let you sell items and selling items and giving points instead of money
